Title: Water
Summary: Set in colonial India against Gandhi's rise to power.it's the story of 8-year-old Chuyia.who is widowed and sent to a home to live in penitence; once there.Chuyia's feisty presence deeply affects the lives of the other residents.

Title: The Accountant
Summary: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client.the Treasury Department closes in on his activities.and the body count starts to rise.

Title: Highlander
Summary: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent.a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".
